title: California Wine Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & Napa Valley Wine Train Dining Experience
description:
Kissed by Californian sunshine and surrounded by the country’s most renowned vineyards, this is the perfect retreat after days spent sipping America’s finest drops. After exploring downtown Napa, the riverside or the surrounding hinterland, return to Napa Valley Marriott Hotel & Spa's Little Summer for seasonally focused modern plates on the restaurant’s open-air patio or head to South Yard for California-style barbecue with all the fixings. Spend the afternoon enjoying the hotel's glowing fire pits and lush landscaping or unwinding in the garden spaces and luxurious resort-style pool.

Ready to sample the Napa Valley in style? You’ll also enjoy a decadent three-hour lunch onboard the historic Napa Valley Wine Train, dining in absolute comfort as you drift slowly from Napa’s streetscapes to St. Helena’s golden hills.
offer_address: 3425 Solano Avenue, Napa, California 94558, United States

title: Napa Valley Wine Country Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily US$50 Dining Credit & Wine Tastings
description:
Experience the ultimate Napa Valley retreat at the Napa Valley Marriott Hotel & Spa, perfectly situated in the heart of California’s famed wine country. This upscale property offers the ideal blend of relaxation and adventure, with easy access to world-renowned vineyards, gourmet dining and charming local boutiques. Spend your days exploring the picturesque vineyards and return to the hotel for an evening of indulgence with exclusive on-site wine tastings.

Unwind in style with the hotel’s luxurious amenities, including a serene outdoor pool, a rejuvenating spa, and inviting fire pits perfect for relaxing under the Napa sky.
offer_address: 3425 Solano Avenue, Napa, California 94558, United States
